name: FileTriggerProps
description:
A FileTrigger allows a user to access the file system with any pressable React Aria
or React Spectrum component, or custom components built with usePress.

acceptDirectory.description: Enables the selection of directories instead of individual files.

acceptedFileTypes.description: Specifies what mime type of files are allowed.

allowsMultiple.description: Whether multiple files can be selected.

defaultCamera.description: Specifies the use of a media capture mechanism to capture the media on the spot.

onSelect.description: Handler when a user selects a file.
